items.title: Margereta
items.description: A classic Italian pizza with a delicious blend of fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves. The pizza dough is hand-tossed and baked to perfection, creating a thin and crispy crust. Perfectly seasoned with a touch of olive oil and a sprinkle of salt, this pizza is a timeless favorite that brings the authentic taste of Italy to your table.

items.title: Chicken
items.description: A flavorful pizza topped with tender, juicy chicken pieces, mozzarella cheese, and a rich tomato sauce. Enhanced with a blend of aromatic herbs and spices, and finished with a drizzle of tangy barbecue sauce. The crust is baked to a golden brown, providing a crispy base for the delicious toppings. Perfect for chicken lovers looking for a delightful and satisfying meal.

items.title: Pepperoni
items.description: A classic favorite, Pepperoni Pizza features a generous layer of spicy pepperoni slices, perfectly melted mozzarella cheese, and a rich tomato sauce. The pizza is baked to a golden brown with a crispy crust that adds the perfect crunch to each bite. This delicious combination of flavors and textures makes it a timeless choice for pizza lovers everywhere.

items.title: Meat
items.description: A classic favorite, Pepperoni Pizza features a generous layer of spicy pepperoni slices, perfectly melted mozzarella cheese, and a rich tomato sauce. The pizza is baked to a golden brown with a crispy crust that adds the perfect crunch to each bite. This delicious combination of flavors and textures makes it a timeless choice for pizza lovers everywhere.

items.title: Garden
items.description: A classic favorite, Pepperoni Pizza features a generous layer of spicy pepperoni slices, perfectly melted mozzarella cheese, and a rich tomato sauce. The pizza is baked to a golden brown with a crispy crust that adds the perfect crunch to each bite. This delicious combination of flavors and textures makes it a timeless choice for pizza lovers everywhere.

items.title: Hawaiian
items.description: A tropical twist on the classic pizza, the Hawaiian pizza features juicy pineapple chunks and ham slices on a bed of melted mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce. Baked to perfection with a crispy crust, this pizza offers a unique combination of sweet and savory flavors.

items.title: BBQ Chicken
items.description: A tangy and flavorful pizza topped with grilled chicken pieces, red onions, and cilantro, all drizzled with barbecue sauce. Finished with mozzarella cheese and a crispy crust, this BBQ Chicken pizza is perfect for those who enjoy a sweet and smoky flavor profile.

items.title: Four Cheese
items.description: A cheese lover's dream, this pizza features a blend of four delicious cheeses: mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and gorgonzola. The rich and creamy cheese combination is layered on a crispy crust with a light tomato sauce, making it an indulgent and satisfying choice.

items.title: Spicy Veggie
items.description: A zesty and flavorful vegetarian pizza topped with a variety of spicy veggies including jalapeños, bell peppers, red onions, and tomatoes. With mozzarella cheese and a spicy tomato sauce, this pizza offers a kick of heat that’s perfect for those who enjoy bold flavors.

items.title: Mushroom
items.description: A savory pizza topped with a variety of mushrooms including portobello, shiitake, and button mushrooms. Complemented by mozzarella cheese and a garlic herb sauce, the crispy crust enhances the rich and earthy flavors of the mushrooms, making it a favorite for mushroom enthusiasts.

items.title: Kebab
items.description: A juicy grilled beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, crisp pickles, and sliced onions, served in a toasted sesame seed bun.
